definition: ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
see 人不可貌相，海水不可斗量[ren2 bu4 ke3 mao4 xiang4 , hai3 shui3 bu4 ke3 dou3 liang2]
pinyin: hai3 shui3 bu4 ke3 dou3 liang2

definition: you can't judge a person by appearance, just as you can't measure the sea with a pint pot (idiom)
pinyin: ren2 bu4 ke3 mao4 xiang4 , hai3 shui3 bu4 ke3 dou3 liang2
containing_words.word: 人不可貌相，海水不可斗量

definition: Seaboard Geographic Gazetteer (c. 275) by Shen Ying 沈瑩|沈莹

sentences.english: The sea water is said to be hypertonic to the cytoplasm .
sentences.chinese: 海水对细胞质来说是高渗的。

sentences.english: Eutrophication is becoming a serious problem in most of the mariculture areas in China.
sentences.chinese: 当前，中国的多数海水养殖区富营养化相当严重。

sentences.english: This acts as a breakwater and protects the islands from the sea.
sentences.chinese: 这也起到了防浪堤的作用并且保护岛屿不被海水侵蚀。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To study the infectivity of the Vibrio parahaernolyticus isolated from the brine.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究从海水中分离出的副溶血弧菌的致病性。

sentences.english: The sea, at certain parts of the coast, goes out so far that it can no longer be seen.
sentences.chinese: 沿海有些地带，潮落时海水退得很远，连望都望不到。

sentences.english: Water boiled up beneath the bubble, it seethed and spouted.
sentences.chinese: 球体下的海水沸腾起来，不停搅动，喷涌。

sentences.english: Their answer is to spray them with seawater.
sentences.chinese: 他们的答案是把海水喷到云层上。

sentences.english: Present-day Species Of Piranha Resulted From Marine Incursion Into Amazon Basin.
sentences.chinese: 现代水虎是海水入侵亚马逊盆地的结果”。

sentences.english: Did you go bathing in the sea while you were there?
sentences.chinese: 你在那里逗留期间，到大海里进行海水浴没有？

sentences.english: Moon lights made the sea gleam like satin.
sentences.chinese: 月光把海水照得像绸子一般。

sentences.english: Criteria of Seawater Quality of the P. C. C.
sentences.chinese: 中华人民共和国海水水质标准。

sentences.english: A large amount of research has been devoted to the study of lipid nutrition in marine fish larvae during the recent years.
sentences.chinese: 近年来国外海水仔稚鱼脂类营养研究取得了重要进展。

sentences.english: It is crowned by a rooftop terrace with an outdoor saltwater swimming pool.
sentences.chinese: 整个套房由带有海水游泳池的天台环绕。

sentences.english: The Red Sea was divided and congealed or was frozen in place until God released the Sea again.
sentences.chinese: 红海的海水便分开并且凝固住直到上帝让海水复合。

sentences.english: The Red Sea was divided and congealed or was frozen in place until God released the Sea again.
sentences.chinese: 红海的海水便分开并且凝固住直到上帝让海水复合。

sentences.english: Sometimes when she gets lonely Jessica Alba likes to f*ck the ocean.
sentences.chinese: 有时候当杰西卡寂寞了就和海水干。
